apollo.seq.io
Class FastaFile

java.lang.Object
  apollo.io.FileParse
      apollo.seq.io.FastaFile

public class FastaFile
extends FileParse

Parses a fasta file into a Vector of Sequence objects, which can be retrieved with getSeqs
